item.title: Why I Choose Vivaldi as My Primary Browser
item.description: As a Chromium-based browser, Vivaldi not only offers perfect compatibility with Chrome extensions but also provides more user-friendly interface customization, powerful tab management, multi-page tiling, and other unique features. This article compares the user experience between Vivaldi and Chrome in detail to help you find the most suitable primary browser.
